Package eu.acclimatize.unison.jsoncontroller

Class JSONGlobalRadiationController

java.lang.Object
eu.acclimatize.unison.jsoncontroller.JSONGlobalRadiationController
@RestController public class JSONGlobalRadiationController extends Object
A controller to obtain global radiation data in a JSON format.

  • Method Details

    • globlalRadiation

      @GetMapping(value="/locationCollection/{name}/globalRadiation", produces="application/json") public Iterable<HarmonieItem> globlalRadiation(@PathVariable("name") String location, @RequestParam("fromDate") @DateTimeFormat(pattern="d-M-yyyy") Date fromDate, @RequestParam("toDate") @DateTimeFormat(pattern="d-M-yyyy") Date toDate, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Finds a list of Jackson annotated global radiation data.
      Parameters:
      location - The location of interest.
      fromDate - The start date for the data (inclusive).
      toDate - The end date for the data (inclusive).
      response - The HTTP servlet response used to add the vary and cache control headers.
      Returns:
      A list of CloudinessResult items.
